businessProfile.name: Guido's Premium Pizza Auburn Hills
businessProfile.address: 4391 Interpark Dr, Auburn Hills, MI 48326, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 4391 Interpark Dr, Auburn Hills, MI 48326, USA

reviews.text: I order this pizza when I come into town and stay in this area because of convenience to the hotel but I can say that almost every time, somethings a little wrong. Most times, and like today, I say old world pepperoni but get regular and I asked for ranch today and got the cheese dip...the front desk asked assumingly other employees if the ranch was in the box, then said themselves, oh yes it is because i put it in there...but you didnt. It gets annoying to pay $27+ with tip to not get the right toppings on one pizza ordered and the correct side sauce. I get it, people make mistakes, just have more double checks. I enjoy old world for the taste, it crisps up, but i still enjoy the motz bread without sauce, its really good if you want a real cheesebread. I prefer the hand tossed round to the thin crust after having tried to the two. They are plentiful with their toppings and thats always appreciated, i just wish the "quality control check" of it all was better.

Had a bit of a mess up with my order. The manager immediately  made it right and  exemplified great customer service! The pizza and breadsticks were absolutely fantastic! I will be a returning customer! Thank you Matthew!!! I highly recommend this place!
This location has great pizza. I don‚Äôt know why but they do. Everything else seems to be good too. The pizza is the best. Ty ‚úåÔ∏è
My favorite pizza very fresh and delicious. They have a little dinning area also u can eat there.

Great pizza and ok service. I do wish they would not make you click around on their card payment system to not tip though. The only options are to pay I think 5-10 percent tip without having to go to a second screen and manually type in 0.  It's not etiquette to tip table side carryout. Stop it.

editorial_summary.overview: Low-key pizzeria chain serving thin-crust, hand-tossed & deep-dish pies, plus pasta & subs.

This location has great pizza. I don‚Äôt know why but they do. Everything else seems to be good too. The pizza is the best. Ty ‚úåÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: J RF
detailedReviews.text: I order this pizza when I come into town and stay in this area because of convenience to the hotel but I can say that almost every time, somethings a little wrong. Most times, and like today, I say old world pepperoni but get regular and I asked for ranch today and got the cheese dip...the front desk asked assumingly other employees if the ranch was in the box, then said themselves, oh yes it is because i put it in there...but you didnt. It gets annoying to pay $27+ with tip to not get the right toppings on one pizza ordered and the correct side sauce. I get it, people make mistakes, just have more double checks. I enjoy old world for the taste, it crisps up, but i still enjoy the motz bread without sauce, its really good if you want a real cheesebread. I prefer the hand tossed round to the thin crust after having tried to the two. They are plentiful with their toppings and thats always appreciated, i just wish the "quality control check" of it all was better.

detailedReviews.author: Israel Brown
detailedReviews.text: This location has great pizza. I don‚Äôt know why but they do. Everything else seems to be good too. The pizza is the best. Ty ‚úåÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Isiah Holloway
detailedReviews.text: They done fell off

detailedReviews.author: Evan Brown
detailedReviews.text: Love it

detailedReviews.author: Dominic Bolchi (DJDominator)
detailedReviews.text: Drew is the best pizza maker in the world he's needs more money üí∞

detailedReviews.author: MJ
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and ok service. I do wish they would not make you click around on their card payment system to not tip though. The only options are to pay I think 5-10 percent tip without having to go to a second screen and manually type in 0.  It's not etiquette to tip table side carryout. Stop it.

detailedReviews.author: Antonia Flores
detailedReviews.text: The portion sizes are awesome! You definitely get what you pay for and the food tastes great.  I recommend giving them a try!

detailedReviews.author: David Barylski
detailedReviews.text: Bread sticks were sadder than little Caesars. Pizza was mid, greasy and overpriced for what it is. Xtra large is just a large but with smaller slices.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Swanson
detailedReviews.text: Friggin the best cheese for pizza is this place!

detailedReviews.author: Keoki Saylon
detailedReviews.text:
Let me start with....
A quality pie is not difficult.

Let me follow up with....
I think Guido's is the best pie around here.

I have received the same quality from them every time. The toppings are plenty. The portions are perfect.
The crust is even all the way around. Tossed great, not to thick. Fluffy and light, as opposed to sitting like a brick in your stomach.
The flavor of the sauce is Amazing. I get 2 cups on the side with my pie.
I even had a driver pull a pizza out of the heat bag vertically once (which scared the crap outta me) but I opened the box to see the pie still perfectly intact.

There's alot of good pizza out there with alot of....flair, which is cool 'sometimes'.  And there's alot of bad out there that needs to be wiped off the planet.
I don't think I could ask for a better pizza.

The same EVERY TIME. It should not come as a surprise how so many places cannot achieve that, but Guido's does.

detailedReviews.author: Jason
detailedReviews.text: Got wings here tonight and they were most enjoyable haven't had good wings in a long time.

detailedReviews.author: pam
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was very good but crust was a little tough.üòä

detailedReviews.author: Erin ODell
detailedReviews.text: Upon arriving to pick up our order, the Guido that greets you on the front window is perfect. The smells walking in were even more perfect.  We ordered the jalape√±o popper bread... best I think I've ever had...I love the amount of cheese and jalape√±os! The Hawaiian pizza was ON POINT! We also got a pepperoni pizza,  so fire! Will be ordering from here again!

detailedReviews.author: Jerome Grier
detailedReviews.text:
Hey, pizza lovers!
My name is Mr Jerome. I eat pizza about twice a week...
I brought my first one back in 2004
I really loved it, very favorable and premium quality toppings.
Well, I have been gone for ten years to FL. And I been trying out all of the pizza chains around here. So, I ordered one as was expected the quality ingredients, but to no advil I was surprised that the pizza delivered wasn't as it use to be.
The pizza was sparingly with the pizza sauce and sort of cold and not as tasteful as I expected.
The toppings weren't as good.
But I did call and let them know what I received a was told that I could talk to the manager, I sad no and just ended the conversation.
Because I didn't want to wait for a new one or take the chance of having them bring me back another one and be disappointed.
So now they have been moved to the bottom of my go to pizza store.
Next time I am going to go to the store and order another one just to see if it will be better, because I understand that we are all human.
Thxs for reading my experience.
Mr.Jerome.

detailedReviews.author: C
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza but to expensive

detailedReviews.author: Richard Abston
detailedReviews.text: So when I order a salad, I no longer get fresh ranch dressing. Instead they serve packets of  dressing with higher sodium content and ingredients that are harmful to your body in efforts to ‚Äúpreserve‚Äù the packets from going bad. Might as well get a cardiac arrest pizza instead.

detailedReviews.author: Erica G
detailedReviews.text:
This Guidos continues to "wow" us. We order delivery from this location and we were pleasantly surprised for them to call us to say "just want to let you know your pizza is on the way and should be there in about 8 minutes!" We thought this was a one off but a few weeks later they did it again! The service has been stellar!!!

Now their pizza... it's delicious. The motz bread is incredible but even their regular guido bread is great! I love that you can put minced garlic on your crust!

So thank you Guidos for great service and quality pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Harold Furlong
detailedReviews.text:
Had a club sub nice size and tasted great.
Carried out.

detailedReviews.author: William Gambill
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was delicious. The place is just a tiny little spot in a strip mall so atmosphere is as high   as it can be.  That being said, our pizza was delicious and the price was good.

detailedReviews.author: Jeff C
detailedReviews.text:
Updated:  Lost a star. I don't know when they started this but they tack on a hefty junk fee if you pay by card. This fee isn't disclosed when you order and it's not on any of their flyers. Use cash!

Best pizza around! Perfect cheese and a wonderful thick sauce.  The hand tossed crust is always perfectly done with a hint of pizza oven charring.

detailedReviews.author: T Kayani
detailedReviews.text:
The best pizza!!!! You can't go wrong.
Clean environment, Employees are so nice, the new ownership is doing awesome. üëå

detailedReviews.author: Veronica G.
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza, sub and their Motz bread. I have a couple of picky eaters and they loved the food! Stayed at Candlewood next door, so ordered inside, very friendly and would definitely order again!

detailedReviews.author: Alisa McGuire
detailedReviews.text: The best around!! The deep dish is fantastic.. and the sauce is simply amazing.  Never disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Ken PopchocK
detailedReviews.text: Great food every time.  Nice people!

detailedReviews.author: Shawn McGuire
detailedReviews.text: Guidos has the best Detroit Style Deep-dish pizzas!! Try the Jalapeno Popper bread or the Stromboli!! Excellent service, clean restaurant!! Voted Best Pizza!! 5 stars!!

detailedReviews.author: Franky P
detailedReviews.text:
I called several Guidos‚Äôs locations and they all directed me here for delivery
Now Orion Guidos‚Äôs said not in the delivery area
I‚Äôm just a couple miles from there!
Very poor Mgt I will never go here again and will tell my family the same
By by guido‚Äôs
for the answer below 0 to everything service  aweful!!!

detailedReviews.author: brian clark
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around and we have three other choices.

detailedReviews.author: David Ybarra
detailedReviews.text: Guido's is good! Comfort food. Pizza. Pasta. Sandwiches. I had the lasagna, and I'll have it again. Generous portion served with bread sticks that are excellent as well. The dining room is small but adequate for dining in. The service was good, and the restaurant was clean. I'll come back. Thank you.

detailedReviews.author: Ricky Adstien
detailedReviews.text: Not sure if it went through new ownership or new management. In the past I was not penalized for using my card so my wife could track my lunches. In the past I also received little tubs of dressing that would cover my salad. NOW, you get penalized extra fees for using your card and you get (2) packets of Ken‚Äôs dressing for a small salad. Ken‚Äôs has more sodium and lower valued taste in comparison to the ranch dressing that Guido‚Äôs used to give out. They have definitely gone through some lower quality changes.

detailedReviews.author: Cyrille Moreau
detailedReviews.text: This is mainly a place to pickup your food. Great portions and quality ingredients.

detailedReviews.author: Laryl McKinzie
detailedReviews.text: I had been searching all over trying to find a great pizza place. Absolutely love Guidos. They had our food to us quickly. The sauce is just right. You can't go wrong with Guidos

detailedReviews.author: Virginia Shine
detailedReviews.text: Heavy dough. It was okay. My pizza hardly had any taste or sauce. The bread needed to cook longer, we couldn't eat it. It's probably okay if you like thick style pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Sherry Meyer
detailedReviews.text: Thank You so much for the personable service. Great Food! Great Staff!  Loved the ‚ÄúEric Church‚Äù story. I ordered food to eat after the show at Pine Knob! I will definitely be back! üòä

detailedReviews.author: Debra Gutierrez
detailedReviews.text: Had a bit of a mess up with my order. The manager immediately  made it right and  exemplified great customer service! The pizza and breadsticks were absolutely fantastic! I will be a returning customer! Thank you Matthew!!! I highly recommend this place!

detailedReviews.author: Codesoft
detailedReviews.text: Dark little hole in the wall place. The pizza has gone slightly downhill from when I used to order at this location but it still out notches jets.

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Food came out quick, hot and super cheesy.  It's a little pricey, but you get plenty of food.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Roscoe
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a Guido‚Äôs Deluxe and an Antipasto salad.   The hand thrown pizza was flavorful with a delicate crust flavored with minced garlic, abundant toppings, and plenty of fire -roasted sauce.   Best pizza I‚Äôve had in ages.    The salad had abundant amounts of meats, cheese and other veggies.   The only drawback was the average Italian salad dressing.   Great friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: Tom Trevarrow
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza, quick turn around time

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Easter
detailedReviews.text: Fast and friendly

detailedReviews.author: Trenton Tullar
detailedReviews.text: Always a joy ordering from them

detailedReviews.author: Grace
detailedReviews.text: Guidos has the BEST pizza!! My boyfriend and I moved to Indiana several months ago and every time we visit family in Michigan we just have to stop for some Guidos. We also stock up on some homemade dips to bring home with us. Our favorites are the garlic cream cheese and the alfredo!

detailedReviews.author: Felicia Ball
detailedReviews.text: Place was easy to get to, had extremely kind staff- we chatted while they were putting my order in plastic bags for me to more easily carry :) Mostaccioli was as delicious as always, and it's so much pasta it lasts me 3 servings! So makes it super worth the money.

detailedReviews.author: Tim Rettger
detailedReviews.text:
It's 8:20. Online order is turned off. Won't answer their phone.üòè
Again tried to order online to deliver at 10:25. No delivery available.  Just going to stuck with Chicago Brothers.

detailedReviews.author: adrian salazar
detailedReviews.text: Delicioso üòã

detailedReviews.author: Rico Jones
detailedReviews.text: Good stuff

detailedReviews.author: Lana Kaufmann
detailedReviews.text: Always great pizza, everytime!!

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Bogdon
detailedReviews.text: Tried to call at 8:25 for a pick up, and they denied my order because they close at 9:00. I guess they don‚Äôt need the business.

detailedReviews.author: Rachelle Whitaker
detailedReviews.text: We've eaten here a couple of times and weren't huge fans.  I thought it was the sauce (original first time and spicy roasted secondtime) and decided to try  the other sauce.  The sauce change wasn't any better.  The edge crust is good but the rest of the crust is too thin for a non thin crust pizza.  The pepperoni is really good though!  We also love the bread and ranch.  It's not worth the cost though.

detailedReviews.author: David Bieniek
detailedReviews.text: Yummyest bbq chicken

detailedReviews.author: David Robare
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was hot on arrival and was delivered within the said amount of time. Delivery person was polite. No skimping of sauce or toppings. Will definitely be ordering from Guido‚Äôs again when in Orion, MI.

detailedReviews.author: ReeJade Jordan
detailedReviews.text: This was my first time visiting ! The staff was nice and even made modifications for my order . Food was fresh !

detailedReviews.author: Michael Zazeckis
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town. I love their thin crust.

detailedReviews.author: John Nolan
detailedReviews.text: The food was very good yet pricey for just one, the wings were excellent Buffalo style (market price)...

detailedReviews.author: Rochelle Diez
detailedReviews.text: Bad customer service.  Came in wearing my mask (my choice) and was told that I ‚Äúdon‚Äôt need to wear one.‚Äù  Got the stare down snickered look.  Told him no thanks.  Don‚Äôt go here if you want to be judged.   üëé

detailedReviews.author: PATRICK DUNLAP
detailedReviews.text: Price I was charged didn't add up with the menu price, felt I was overcharged, was very upset from the explanation given by the workerüò§üò§üò§

detailedReviews.author: Jim Palermo
detailedReviews.text: While the pizza isn‚Äôt bad, I‚Äôd have to say it‚Äôs ‚Äúall right‚Äù.  It certainly is not Detroit style deep dish, being not much thicker than a Domino‚Äôs plain pizza.   No comparison to Buscemi or Buddy‚Äôs Detroit style.   Also found that the sauce was added in 4 thin strips not distributed over the whole surface. A big thing for me.  I will say it seems to be a good size for the price paid however.     All in all; just fair.

detailedReviews.author: Jarred Lemanski
detailedReviews.text: One of my favorite places to get a pizza. Always good. I think the best is the deep dish pizzas.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.3/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the quality and flavor of Guido's pizza, highlighting the perfect crust and amazing sauce. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The portion sizes are generous, ensuring customers feel they get great value for their money. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The jalape√±o popper bread and Hawaiian pizza are standout items that customers rave about. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent order accuracy and quality control issues (e.g., wrong toppings, incorrect side sauces) - review management can address this concern
Negative customer experiences with additional fees and payment system frustrations (e.g., undisclosed card fees, tipping system issues) - review management can address this concern
Poor customer service and communication issues (e.g., unresponsive phone service, delivery area confusion) - Boostly marketing services can improve this

neutral.author: J RF
neutral.text: I order this pizza when I come into town and stay in this area because of convenience to the hotel but I can say that almost every time, somethings a little wrong. Most times, and like today, I say old world pepperoni but get regular and I asked for ranch today and got the cheese dip...the front desk asked assumingly other employees if the ranch was in the box, then said themselves, oh yes it is because i put it in there...but you didnt. It gets annoying to pay $27+ with tip to not get the right toppings on one pizza ordered and the correct side sauce. I get it, people make mistakes, just have more double checks. I enjoy old world for the taste, it crisps up, but i still enjoy the motz bread without sauce, its really good if you want a real cheesebread. I prefer the hand tossed round to the thin crust after having tried to the two. They are plentiful with their toppings and thats always appreciated, i just wish the "quality control check" of it all was better.

negative.text: Bread sticks were sadder than little Caesars. Pizza was mid, greasy and overpriced for what it is. Xtra large is just a large but with smaller slices.
